channel.title: Copy Constructors on Outcome documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Copy Constructors on Outcome documentation

item.title: `basic_result(const basic_result &)`
item.description: Copy constructor. Requires: that value_type and error_type both implement a copy constructor. Complexity: Same as for value_type’s and error_type’s copy constructors. Constexpr, triviality and noexcept of underlying operations is propagated.
